sub_title: Senior Ecologist & advisor on Extractives at IUCN NL
summary: Having worked in, often remote, conservation projects & programmes in the field in South/Central America, SE Asia and Africa for roughly 14 years, I am working from Europe since 2004. Working with IUCN NL since then, most of my time is geared towards the facilitation and strengthening of conservation initiatives from local NGOs in the global south (including program management). From 2022 my geographic focus is concentrating on Madagascar & Indian Ocean Islands, with still some attention to Eastern DRC. Current thematic focus: the extractive industry, energy transition, conservation, climate, CSO interface.
